subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers announced Tuesday that Eric LeGrand’s No. 52 jersey would be the first retired by the program. LeGrand will be honored in a ceremony Sept. 14.
snippet: Rutgers announced Tuesday that Eric LeGrand’s No. 52 jersey would be the first retired by the program. LeGrand will be honored in a ceremony Sept. 14.
